description:
Privacy costs money....or so you thought! Today I cover how to achieve reasonable levels of privacy on a budget with budget-friendly privacy tools. I dive into password managers, search engines, messengers, operating systems and so much more with three budgets: $13/month, $5/month, and $0/month. Enjoy, and I hope this gives ideas to maximize your privacy & security!

Thank you to our sponsor Notesnook who offers a super generous free plan with affordable premium plans: https://notesnook.com

Inspired by Henry's budget privacy post on the Techlore forum: https://discuss.techlore.tech/t/whats-currently-the-cheapest-setup-for-attaining-reasonable-privacy-security/10344/5
We can't cover EVERY service in the video, but the resources on our site should fill in any gaps: https://techlore.tech/resources

🔐 Techlore Homepage: https://techlore.tech
🕵 Go Incognito Course: https://techlore.tech/goincognito
💻 Techlore Community: https://discuss.techlore.tech
🏫 Techlore Coaching: https://techlore.
title: How to Stay Private on a Budget!
